TEXT.TITLE: SILVER STATE MINING <SSMC> CORRECTS NET
TEXT.BODY: Silver State Mining Corp said it has corrected its 1986 fourth quarter net income to 485,380 dlrs from 528,790 dlrs reported earlier today. The company earned 286,969 dlrs in last year's fourth quarter. Reuter
